name: 林逾先
objective:
本課程教導學生管理一項專案時有關時間及成本的估計，進度表與預算的編列等，以及其他監督控制一項專案進行之相關技巧。專案投資的可行性分析、專案的風險評估、以及專案團隊與專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。
This course teaches students the estimations of time and cost when managing a project, the development of project schedule and budget, and other relevant skills in monitoring and controlling the project. The feasibility study of project investment, the risk assessment of a project and the role of project manager in a project team within an organization will also be discussed.
